full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL YUM DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I BSKANG BZLOG GI CHO GA RGYAS PA BYA TSUL GYI THO YIG BKRA SHIS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
